overview: Can you dig it? Sesame Street: Old School Volume 2 picks up right where Volume 1 left off, including all of the grooviest Sesame Street memories from 1974 to 1979! Remember when friends like Don Music, Roosevelt Franklin, Guy Smilty and Fat Blue were on the street? Break out your boogie shoes for far out classics like "What's the Name of That Song?" and "Telephone Rock!" Rediscover the Sesame Street of the 1970sâ€”the place where you learned about letters, numbers, and loveable furry monsters. Catch you on the flip side!
title: Sesame Street: Old School Vol. 2 (1974-1979)
